Package shaharas

Class OperatorInfo

java.lang.Object
shaharas.OperatorInfo
public class OperatorInfo extends Object
The `OperatorInfo` class holds information about an operator in a mathematical expression. It encapsulates the operator's pattern, symbol, priority, creator (operator instance), and operand count. This class is used for representing operators and their characteristics in the expression evaluator.

  • Constructor Details

    • OperatorInfo

      public OperatorInfo(OperatorInfo info)
      Copy constructor that creates a new `OperatorInfo` object from an existing one. It clones the `creator` and copies other fields.
      Parameters:
      info - The `OperatorInfo` object to copy.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the `creator` is null.

    • OperatorInfo

      public OperatorInfo(Pattern pattern, String symbol, int priority, Operators creator, int operandCount)
      Constructor that initializes the operator information with provided values.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The regex pattern for the operator.
      symbol - The symbol representing the operator.
      priority - The operator's priority.
      creator - The operator instance that can perform calculations.
      operandCount - The number of operands required for the operator.

  • Method Details
